note: I teach social sciences writing for National University in San Diego and I worked a dozen years in educational publishing (books and software). I earned my PhD in English from the U of Washington. Since a child I've been fascinated by marionettes, planetariums, wax museums, and dodos. More recently I've taken interests in biblical authorship and colonial American history. I read Peter Ackroyd, William Gibson, and Salman Rushdie. My favorite TV shows are Deadwood and Green Acres.
